welcome_message_body: Welcome to Draper, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities. Known for its beautiful outdoor scenery and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provo Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Provo Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily serving Delta Air Lines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction at Salt Lake City International Airport, set to open in 2024.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and agree to the terms and conditions to connect.
